Question
========
A researcher wants to know whether households in the Netherlands
(group 1) are more economical about their water consumption than French
households (group 2). The variable "water consumption" is measured with
the amount of water consumed per day, for which a t-test for two
independent groups is used.  
  
What is the used null hypothesis in this study?

Answerlist
----------
* H<sub>0</sub>: μ<sub>1 </sub>= 0 and μ<sub>2</sub> = 0.
* H<sub>0</sub>: μ<sub>1 </sub>≠ μ<sub>2</sub>.
* H<sub>0</sub>: μ<sub>1</sub> - μ<sub>2 </sub>= 0.
* H<sub>0</sub>: μ<sub>1 </sub>- μ<sub>2 </sub>≠ 0.
